Determine the appropriate boolean operation as: Extrude the combined sketch normal (towards the positive Z-axis) to create a cylindrical object, while also cutting material to create a smaller cylindrical hole in the center. elen: * `Extrude_depth_towards_normal` and `Extrude_depth_opposite_normal` will determine the resulting length of the outer and inner cylindrical shapes, respectively. * Coordinate system and sketch are placed according to the JSON provided, align the shapes accordingly. This concludes the construction of Part 1, with a final shape framed in the context of a cylindrical object with a smaller cylindrical hole in the center and positioned in the upper right corner of the image ("A cylindrical object with a smaller cylindrical hole in the center, positioned in the upper right corner of the image.").</description>
